name: Cultist Deal
description:
This game was made in 48hrs for the GMTK Gamejam 2021 "Joined Together"

Multiple Ways to Escape, Bond with Altars to gain temporary Powers, but be careful these dark bonds don't like to be broken. 

- ALTF4/Rage  game-ish, 5-10mins game time

Made with AssetPack: Simple Dungeon  Simple Dungeons - Cartoon Assets | 3D Dungeons | Unity Asset Store   Synty Studios

Music: http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/  Tallbeard Studios

Tools:  Unreal Engine 4, Bfxr for sounds effects

Gamedevteam: me, myself and I

My first time joining a gamejam, it was fun! And my second finished game overall xD
